Headline: #26 South Shore Express, #71 71st/South Shore Temporary Northbound Reroute near South Shore Drive/80th
ShortDescription: NB 26 South Shore Express, 71 71st/South Shore  buses are temporarily rerouted via Commercial, 83rd, Exchange. 79th and South Shore Drive.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #26 South Shore Express, #71 71st/South Shore buses are temporarily rerouted via Commercial, 83rd, Exchange. 79th and South Shore Drive, due to street blockage near South Shore Drive/80th.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Loop-bound Pink Line Delays
ShortDescription: Loop-bound Pink Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier police activity at 54th/Cermak. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Loop-bound Pink Line trains are running with residual delays following earlier police activity at 54th/Cermak.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
